item.title: Federal judge blocks Trump's birthright citizenship ban for all infants, testing lower court powers
item.description: The judge granted class certification to all infants in the U.S. impacted by the executive order.

item.title: Hawley moves to block China's buy-up of US farmland as Trump admin sounds alarm
item.description: Sen. Hawley's bill aims to counter Chinese ownership of U.S. farmland, especially near military bases, which officials call a security concern.
